long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cat Runner online is available in the chrome web store just install it and play Cat Runner online game.

Cat Runner is a cool endless running game that has similar gameplay to the popular Angry Gran series. In this title you take control of a street cat - he is running rampage through the streets trying to catch fish bones to eat! You must use the left and right arrows to move your cat and avoid the obstacles as you collect the fish.

Note: There are multiple different games available to play.

Controls:-

               Left or right arrow to change lane
               Up arrow to jump
                Down arrow to slide
